title: Deep Learning with TensorFlow and Keras
reason: This course directly aligns with your interest in neural networks and provides a strong next step from ML fundamentals into specialized deep learning techniques.

reason: This course perfectly matches your interest in production workflows by teaching you how to deploy and maintain machine learning models at scale.

reason: This course offers a specialization in computer vision, including applications of CNNs, which could extend your knowledge from ML fundamentals.

title: Foundations of Machine Learning
reason: This course covers foundational machine learning concepts which largely overlap with your completed "ML fundamentals" course.
